actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the valuation of a descendent's interest in a closely held business for estate tax purposes.

summary.text: Permits a taxpayer to elect a specified schedule for computing the valuation of a decedent's interest in a closely held business for estate tax purposes under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the valuation of a descendent's interest in a closely held business for estate tax purposes.
